resources.string: “We make a living by what we get, but make a life by what we give.”

Smilyo is working for financial inclusion of Slum Dwellers of Choona Bhatti Area near Kirti Nagar Metro Station since December, 2014. We have now employed a local resident to assist us in our initiative with a salary of Rs. 5000/- per month. Her work includes providing basic education to the residents and enable them to read and sign. This helps them avail various banking fascilities which are not for the uneducated like ATM Card. She has an additional duty to run a local bank help centre for providing financial literacy to the local residents and resolve their bank related issues.


We would need your help in sustaining her salary. You just need to pledge and send a minor amount of Rs. 100/- per month for this purpose. To donate, please contact us using the information given below.
